txt.en:
'[placeholder], to arms! Angmar approaches! The False King sends a host against Aughaire in great wrath.

'Mordirith's ire has been raised against the Trév Gállorg and will not be sated until Aughaire lies in ruin. We must attend to the defence of the village!

'Gather your allies... the fighting will be fierce!'
'Thank you for your aid, [placeholder]. We have won a victory at Aughaire, but we cannot relax our defence until Angmar is defeated.'
'Is your fellowship assembled? Are you ready to defend Aughaire?'
Mordirith, the Steward of Angmar has returned, and his wrath against the Hillmen of Aughaire is terrible.
Firingal is near Gath Forthnír.\n\nMordirith's host approaches Aughaire in the western reaches of Angmar. The Ranger Firingal has asked you to aid in the defence of Aughaire.
Firingal is near Gath Forthnír.\n\nYou should speak with Firingal regarding the defence of Aughaire.
